data.eml:eml: Description of the first species of Cymodusa Holmgren from Brazil (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Campopleginae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Onody, Helena C., Penteado-Dias, Angélica Maria (2019): Description of the first species of Cymodusa Holmgren from Brazil (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Campopleginae). Zootaxa 4545 (3): 434-440, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4545.3.7
